name: Darling, have you seen the children?
name_original: Darling, have you seen the children?
description:
This is a small game, where a father goes "deeper and deeper" in caves, searching for his children. Who knows what's awaiting on the bottom of the caves?

Controls:

  • Use arrows or WASD to control the caracter (UP or W for jump).
  • Use space to attack with the sword.
  • You can "wall-jump", by pressing "jump" again when against a wall.
  • At the end of each level press "E" to interact with the lift and go to the next level.

The game might be harder than we intended, good luck ;-)

It was made for the Ludum Dare 48 GameJam. We are a team of 4 begginners in game development and we made the visual assets and programming ourselves. The sounds come from freesound.org.
